hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd /var/jenkins_home/jobs/Home-Assistant/workspace/home-assistant/ COMMIT=$(git --git-dir=/var/jenkins_home/jobs/Home-Assistant/workspace/home-assistant/.git --work-tree=/var/jenkins_home/jobs/Home-Assistant/workspace/home-assistant/ log | head -n 1 | awk '{print $2}' | sed 's/^\(.......\).*$/\1/g') TAG=$(git --git-dir=/var/jenkins_home/jobs/Home-Assistant/workspace/home-assistant/.git --work-tree=/var/jenkins_home/jobs/Home-Assistant/workspace/home-assistant/ tag -l --sort=committerdate | tail -n 1) IMAGE="tedsluis/home-assistant:$TAG-$COMMIT" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@192.168.11.100 "cd /home/jenkins/jobs/Home-Assistant/workspace/home-assistant/; docker build -f /home/jenkins/jobs/Home-Assistant/workspace/home-assistant/Dockerfile --cpuset-cpus 1 -t $IMAGE -t tedsluis/home-assistant:latest ."

cd /var/jenkins_home/jobs/Home-Assistant/workspace/home-assistant/ COMMIT=$(git --git-dir=/var/jenkins_home/jobs/Home-Assistant/workspace/home-assistant/.git --work-tree=/var/jenkins_home/jobs/Home-Assistant/workspace/home-assistant/ log | head -n 1 | awk '{print $2}' | sed 's/^\(.......\).*$/\1/g') TAG=$(git --git-dir=/var/jenkins_home/jobs/Home-Assistant/workspace/home-assistant/.git --work-tree=/var/jenkins_home/jobs/Home-Assistant/workspace/home-assistant/ tag -l --sort=committerdate | tail -n 1) IMAGE="tedsluis/home-assistant:$TAG-$COMMIT" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@192.168.11.100 'cat /home/jenkins/jobs/build-home-assistant/workspace/docker.secret | xargs docker login --username tedsluis --password' ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@192.168.11.100 "docker push $IMAGE" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@192.168.11.100 'docker push tedsluis/home-assistant:latest'

ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@192.168.11.100 'docker image prune -a -f' ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@192.168.11.100 'docker container prune -f' ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@192.168.11.100 'docker volume prune -f' ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@192.168.11.100 'docker network prune -f' ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@192.168.11.100 'docker system prune -f'
